examples.example: 只要我们充满信心，就一定能够克服所有困难，迎接美好的未来。

translate.english: As long as we are full of confidence, we will surely be able to overcome all difficulties and welcome a beautiful future.

examples.example: 无论面对怎样的挑战，我们都要保持信心，勇往直前。

translate.english: No matter what kind of challenges we face, we should keep confidence and move forward bravely.

examples.example: 即使遇到挫折，我们也要坚定信心，相信自己一定能成功。

translate.english: Even if encountering setbacks, we should also firm our confidence and believe that we can succeed for sure.
